1TIM 4.5 gaweihada auk þairh waurd gudis jah bida.
1TIM 4.6 þata insakands broþrum goþs wairþis andbahts Xristaus Iesuis, alands waurdam galaubeinais jah godaizos laiseinais þoei galaistides.
1TIM 4.7 iþ þo usweihona swe usalþanaizo spilla biwandei, iþ þroþei þuk silban du gagudein.
1TIM 4.8 aþþan leikeina usþroþeins du fawamma ist bruks, iþ gagudei du allamma ist bruks, gahaita habandei libainais þizos nu jah þizos anawairþons.
1TIM 4.9 triggw þata waurd jah allaizos andanumtais wairþ.
1TIM 4.10 duþþe allis arbaidjam jah idweitjanda, unte wenidedum du guda libandin, saei ist nasjands allaize manne, þishun galaubjandane.
1TIM 4.11 anabiud þata jah laisei.
1TIM 4.12 ni manna þeinai jundai frakunni, ak frisahts sijais þaim galaubjandam in waurda, in usmeta, in friaþwai, in galaubeinai, in swikniþai.
1TIM 4.13 unte qima, gaumei saggwa boko, gaþlaihtai, laiseinai.
1TIM 4.14 ni sijais unkarja þizos in þus anstais, sei gibana warþ þus þairh praufetjans afar analageinai handiwe praizbwtaireins.
1TIM 4.15 þo sido þus, in-uþ-þaim sijais, ei þatei þeihais þu, swikunþ sijai allaim.
1TIM 4.16 atsaiƕ du þus silbin jah du laiseinai usdaudo,
þairhwis in þaim;
þatuh auk taujands jah þuk silban ganasjis jah hausjandans þus.
1TIM 5.1 Seneigana ni andbeitais, ak gaþlaih swe attin, juggans swe broþruns; 1TIM 5.2 sineigos swe aiþeins, juggos swe swistruns in allai swiknein.
1TIM 5.3 widuwons swerai, þozei bi sunjai sijaina widuwons.
...1TIM 5.4 galaisjaina sik faurþis swesana gard barusnjan jah andalauni usgiban fadreinam;
þata auk ist andanem in andwairþja gudis.
1TIM 5.5 aþþan soei bi sunjai widuwo ist jah ainakla, wenida du guda jah þairhwisiþ in bidom nahtam jah dagam.
1TIM 5.6 iþ so wizondei in azetjam jah libandei dauþa ist.
1TIM 5.7 jah þata anabiud ei ungafairinodos sijaina.
1TIM 5.8 aþþan jabai ƕas swesaim þishun ingardjam ni gaþlaihiþ, galaubein inwidiþ jah ist ungalaubjandin wairsiza.

1TIM 5.9 widuwo gawaljaidau ni mins saihs tigum jere, sei wesi ainis abins qens, 1TIM 5.10 in waurstwam godaim weitwodiþa habandei, jah barna fodidedi, jah gastins andnemi, jah weihaim fotuns þwohi, jah aglons winnandam andbahtidedi, jah allamma waurstwe godaize afarlaistidedi.
1TIM 5.11 iþ juggos widuwons biwandei;
þan auk gairnidedeina wiþra Xristu, liugan wileina, 1TIM 5.12 habandeins staua, unte frumein galaubein wana gatawidedun.
1TIM 5.13 aþþan samana jah unwaurstwons laisjand sik þairhgaggan gardins, aþþan ni þatain unwaurstwons, ak jah unfaurjos jah fairweitjandeins, rodjandeins þoei ni skulda sind.
1TIM 5.14 wiljau nu juggos liugan, barna bairan, garda waldan...
...1TIM 5.16 widuwons, andbahtjai im, jah ni kaurjaidau aikklesjo, ei þaim bi sunjai...
...1TIM 5.17 in waurda jah in laiseinai.
1TIM 5.18 qaþ auk gameleins: auhsau þriskandin munþ ni faurwaipjais; jah: wairþs sa waurstwa mizdons is.
1TIM 5.19 bi praizbwtairein wroh ni andnimais, niba in andwairþja twaddje aiþþau þrije weitwode.
1TIM 5.20 iþ þans frawaurhtans in andwairþja allaize gasak, ei jah þai anþarai agis habaina.
1TIM 5.21 weitwodja in andwairþja gudis jah fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus jah þize gawalidane aggile, ei þata fastais inu faurdomein, ni waiht taujands bi wiljahalþein.
1TIM 5.22 handuns sprauto ni mannhun lagjais,
ni gamainja siais frawaurhtim framaþjaim;
þuk silban swiknana fastais.
1TIM 5.23 ju ni drigkais þanamais wato, ak weinis leitil brukjais in qiþaus þeinis jah þizo ufta sauhte þeinaizo.
